        <div class="ms-WPBody" role="textbox">
            <div class="ms-rtestate-field"><h3>Q2 and H1&nbsp;2017 results</h3>
<br>
<hr style="line-height: 15px; font-size: 12px;"> 
<ul>
   <span class="ms-rteThemeForeColor-1-0">Vallourec will release its Q2 and H1 2017 financial&nbsp;results today at 5:​​​​​​​​​​​​​45 pm CET 
      <br> 
      <br>Connect to the webcast starting today at 6:30 pm CET​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​<br><br></span></ul>
